dialogueText: Hey there human! What can I call you?

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: Do you happen to know English?

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: My name is Dr. Zero and I am from the [???] universe.

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: My company and I have been traveling around Earth learning different languages. This is our last destination and we are here to learn English.

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: We would like to exchange languages. Which language would you like to learn? [Chinese] [English]

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: These [zoom in to waypoint] are called waypoints.
